    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    ButtonsPanel
    A panel containing buttons for managing game-related actions in the Game Tracker application.
    CheckboxesPanel
    A panel containing checkboxes for managing game status options.
    FileUtils
    Utility class for file operations such as deletion and copying.
    GameInfo
    Represents a game with its associated details.
    GameManager
    Manages the list of games and provides functionality to add, update, delete, and retrieve game information.
    GameTrackerGUI
    Implements the graphical user interface (GUI) for the Game Tracker application.
    HtmlOpener
    Handles opening HTML files in the system's default web browser.
    JsonHandler
    Handles reading and writing game data to and from a JSON file.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Game Tracker application.
    ResourceExtractor
    Extracts resource files from the application classpath to the target directory.
    SimpleHttpServer
    Starts a simple HTTP server to serve files from the application's execution directory.
    TextFieldsPanel
    A panel containing text fields for inputting game-related information.
